venue.name: NH Americans for Prosperity Field Office

item.description:
Come sample microbrews from right here in New Hampshire while we phonebank, then join us afterwards for a screening of "Beer Wars," a documentary detailing the harmful effect that government regulation has had on craft breweries. Feel free to BYOB if you have any favorite craft brews you'd like to share.

The top caller for AFP this week gets a American Eagle silver dollar, and the top caller this month gets an iPad, so be sure to come in early and make some calls!

The office will be open starting at 3, and the screening will begin shortly after 8. Stop by for free beer, great prizes, and freedom!
item.name: Beer Wars Screening and NH Microbrew Tasting
